trans-unit.source: Displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: 在可自定义的网格中显示数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control provides a customizable table for displaying data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件用于显示数据提供可自定义的表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类允许的单元格、 行、 列和通过使用属性的边框的自定义项，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Basic Formatting and Styling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[基本格式设置和 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to display data with or without an underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件来显示数据源或没有基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: Without specifying a data source, you can create columns and rows that contain data and add them directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定数据源，你可以创建列和包含数据，并将它们直接添加的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection to access <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to read or write cell values directly.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合来访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>对象和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来直接读取或写入单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Item%2A> indexer also provides direct access to cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Item%2A>索引器还提供对单元格的直接访问。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to populating the control manually, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to a data source and automatically populate it with data.
trans-unit.target: 手动填充控件的替代方法，你可以将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>属性将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>到数据源，并自动将其填充数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When working with very large amounts of data, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` to display a subset of the available data.
trans-unit.target: 当使用的数据量非常大，您可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性`true`来显示可用数据的子集。

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode requires the implementation of a data cache from which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is populated.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟模式需要实现的数据缓存从其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件中填充。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Display Modes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据显示模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the features available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, see [DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关中可用的功能的其他信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，请参阅[DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control of previous versions, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件替换，并将功能添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>的早期版本中，控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控制保留向后兼容性和将来使用，如果你选择。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control inherits both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A> properties from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, but supports only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件继承同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，但仅支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化一个未绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> indicating the row and column indexes of the new current cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，指示新的当前单元格的行和列索引。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 当新单元格成为当前的单元格时，通知可访问的客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload twice using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents.Focus> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents.Selection> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换到指定的行和列索引`objectID`和`childID`参数和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载两次使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents.Focus>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents.Selection>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1.
trans-unit.target: `objectID`和`childID`由编号顺序显示，如果它们是可见且从 1 开始计数的行或列的标头的可见的行和列。

trans-unit.source: For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果列标题是否可见，`objectID`对于第一个可见非标头行为 2。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> property of <paramref name="cellAddress" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cellAddress" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> 属性值小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> property of <paramref name="cellAddress" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cellAddress" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> 属性值小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: Override this method when customizing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and modifying how and when the current cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 自定义时重写此方法<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />控件并修改当前单元格如何以及何时更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a custom row type that merges multiple cells into single cells and you modify the navigation accordingly, you can override this method to provide accessibility support for your changes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果创建将多个单元格合并为单个单元格的自定义的行类型，并且相应地修改导航，你可以重写该方法以提供辅助功能支持所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that that represents the column header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示要修改的列标题边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that is used to store intermediate changes to the column header border style.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，用于存储对列标题边框样式进行的中间更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is currently being painted is in the first column displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要指示当前正在绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 位于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上显示的第一列中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is currently being painted is in the last column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要指示当前正在绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 位于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的最后一列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> for a column header cell of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that is currently being painted.
trans-unit.target: 为当前正在绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的列标题单元格调整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style for the current column header.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示当前列标题的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A> method to determine the appearance of the borders for the column header cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件在内部调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>方法来确定的列标题单元格的边框外观。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件通常使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A> method to customize the borders of the column header cells.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>方法以自定义列标题单元格的边框。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>类。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want to customize the appearance of the border on column header cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要自定义列标题单元格的边框外观，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style for the upper-left cell in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 左上角单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the style of the border of the upper-left cell in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 左上角单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The upper-left cell is the cell that is shared by the column header row and the row header column.
trans-unit.target: 左上角单元格是由列标题行和行标题列共享的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> gets the value of this property while painting the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绘制左上角单元格时获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> property to customize the borders of the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A>属性可自定义的左上角单元格的边框。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>类。

trans-unit.source: Override this property if you want to customize the appearance of the border on the upper-left header cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要自定义的左上角标头单元格的边框外观，重写此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style of the cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property to customize the appearance of cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>属性可自定义单元格的边框的外观。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的内置样式边框的样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the column header cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中列标题单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell" /> 对象的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property to customize the appearance of column header cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性可自定义列标题单元格边框的外观。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的内置样式边框的样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the row header cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中行标题单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> 对象的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property to customize the appearance of row header cells' borders in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性可自定义中派生的行标题单元格边框外观<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的内置样式边框的样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the option to add rows is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否向用户显示添加行的选项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the add-row option is displayed to the user; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果向用户显示“添加行”选项，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to add rows if both this property and the data source's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据，则允许用户将添加行，如果此属性和数据源的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许通过手动对列重新定位。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can change the column order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以更改列的顺序，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position.
trans-unit.target: 启用对列重新定位后，用户可以将列标头拖动到新位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，冻结和解冻的列组成的两个单独的组;用户可重新定位在组中，列，但不能将列从一个组移到其他。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件不支持双缓冲。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>设置为`true`中派生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以调整列的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can resize columns; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以调整列的大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以防止用户手动更改列宽。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: 这非常有用，例如，仅显示列，一次加载数据，并且列在该时间调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize rows.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以调整行的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all the rows are resizable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以对所有的行进行大小调整，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以防止用户手动更改行高。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: 这非常有用，例如，仅显示控件，数据加载一次并且行的大小在该时间。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的奇数行的默认单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to apply to the odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用于奇数行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将显示其使用指示的单元格的样式的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性，该类继承自其他类型的属性的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>。

trans-unit.source: For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的样式具有奇数索引号的行中的单元格，为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性重写通过指定的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>，重写了通过指定的样式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，使用单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>设置此属性对于多个行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性来创建在帐目型效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为新值时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the rows and columns with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible" /> property values of <see langword="false" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果包括 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible" /> 属性值为 <see langword="false" /> 的行和列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether all the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> cells are currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前是否选择了所有的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all cells (or all visible cells) are selected or if there are no cells (or no visible cells); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了所有的单元格（或所有可见的单元格）或者没有单元格（或没有可见的单元格），则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection does not perform efficiently with large selections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合不对于大型选择有效地执行。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> have been selected before you access the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection, check the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否中的所有单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>之前访问的内容已选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合，检查返回值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, this method can cause rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此方法可以使行成为非共享行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> performance, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>性能，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this method to avoid calculations involving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法可避免计算涉及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember" /> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember" /> 属性时是否自动创建列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应自动创建列，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are set or changed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为时自动生成列`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>设置或更改属性。

trans-unit.source: Columns can also be automatically generated when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 列也可以自动时生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性更改从`false`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>更改，以使不匹配的前一个列的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>值，不匹配的列中的数据将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>未设置属性。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件数据源中生成对象的每个公共属性的一个列。

trans-unit.source: If the bound objects implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定的对象实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>接口，该控件生成一列以返回每个属性进行<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents.
trans-unit.target: 每个列标题将包含列表示的属性名称的值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property but set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> to `false`, you must add columns manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性，但不是集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>到`false`，您必须手动添加列。

trans-unit.source: You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置将每个添加的列绑定到数据源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>到由绑定的对象公开的属性的名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>在 Windows 窗体设计器会自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性`false`，生成代码以添加并将绑定数据源中的每个属性的列。

trans-unit.source: The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时生成的代码是等效于以下示例所示手动添加代码。

trans-unit.source: It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不是在发生的运行时的列自动生成相同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add columns manually and bind them to a data source when you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何手动添加列并将它们绑定到数据源中，当你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is bound to a list of `Task` business objects.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件绑定到的列表`Task`业务对象。

trans-unit.source: Then, columns are added and are bound to `Task` properties through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，添加列，并绑定到`Task`属性通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表中的对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。

trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumnsChanged" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumnsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of its cells.
trans-unit.target: 调整指定列的宽度以适应其单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 调整指定列的宽度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用此方法以使足够大以容纳新的单元格值的列宽度。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整指定列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用此方法以使足够大以容纳新的单元格值的列宽度。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.None" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.None" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current row heights; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于当前的行高计算新宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在行高也进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that row heights will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整指定列的宽度，还可以选择在行高随后进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，使用你将在调用的假定条件下计算的列宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.None" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.None" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit the header contents.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题的高度以适应标题内容。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit the contents of the largest column header.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题的高度以适应最大列标题的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制当调整列标题。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列标题的高度如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to resize column headers and rows as a result of a button click.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调整列标题并单击某个按钮后的行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: 某一列的索引，该列包含内容已更改的标题。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定列中的标题内容的更改来调整列标题的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列标题进行大小调整只会在指定列中标题内容的用户编辑或更改的结果更改到绑定的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 列标题的高度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the row headers; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the height with the expectation that the row headers width will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于行标题的当前宽度来计算新高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在行标题的宽度也进行调整的假定条件下计算高度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new height based on the current column widths; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the height with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于当前的列宽计算新高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果在列宽也进行调整的假定条件下计算高度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit their contents, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题的高度以适应其内容，还可以选择在列和/或行标题的宽度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制当调整列标题。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列标题的高度如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnsWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的列标题的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column header whose contents should be used to determine new height.
trans-unit.target: 其内容应当用于确定新高度的列标题的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the row headers; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the height with the expectation that the row headers width will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于行标题的当前宽度来计算新高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在行标题的宽度也进行调整的假定条件下计算高度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the specified column; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the height with the expectation that the column width will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于指定列的当前宽度计算新高度，为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在列宽也进行调整的假定条件下计算高度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定列中标题内容的更改来调整列标题的高度，还可以选择在列和/或行标题的宽度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列标题进行大小调整只会在指定列中标题内容的用户编辑或更改的结果更改到绑定的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 列标题的高度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的列标题的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>下一步。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of their cells.
trans-unit.target: 调整所有列的宽度以适应其单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.
trans-unit.target: 调整所有列的宽度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果更高版本的列的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调整所有列调整为合适的列和列标题的内容。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整所有列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果更高版本的列的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调整所有列调整为合适的列和列标题的内容。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new widths based on the current row heights; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the widths with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于当前的行高计算新宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在行高也进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the widths with the expectation that row heights will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整所有列的宽度，还可以选择在行高随后进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果更高版本的列的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>属性或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，使用你将在调用的假定条件下计算的列宽<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of its cells.
trans-unit.target: 调整指定行的高度以适应其单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of all its cells including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 调整指定行的高度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整行大小。

trans-unit.source: The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的所有行，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。
