trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers to fit the header contents.
trans-unit.target: 调整行标题的宽度以适应标题内容。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整行标题的宽度如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: 内容已更改的行标题的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式，基于指定行中标题内容的更改调整行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中指定的行的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 行标题的宽度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以调整大小基于对的第一行的标题内容的更改在行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到行数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 的值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current height of the column headers; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the height of the column headers will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于列标题的当前高度计算新宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在列标题的高度也进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current row heights; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于当前的行高计算新宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在行高也进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整行标题的宽度，还可以选择在行和/或列标题的高度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整行标题的宽度如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowsHeight`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的行标题的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: 某一行的索引，该行包含内容已更改的标题。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current height of the column headers; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the height of the column headers will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于列标题的当前高度计算新宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在列标题的高度也进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current height of the specified row; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row height will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要基于指定行的当前高度计算新宽度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要在行高也进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式基于指定行中标题内容的更改来调整行标题的宽度，还可以选择在列和/或行标题的高度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算宽度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中指定的行的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 行标题的宽度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受到保护，并旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowHeight`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的行标题的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到行数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of some or all rows to fit their contents.
trans-unit.target: 调整某些或所有行的高度以适应其内容。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of all rows to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.
trans-unit.target: 调整所有行的高度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整行大小。

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的特定行，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的行的子集，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调整基于非标头单元格内容的所有行的都大小。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于当前的列宽计算新高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果在列宽也进行调整的假定条件下计算高度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of all rows using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the heights with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整所有行的高度，还可以选择在列宽随后进行调整的假定条件下计算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整行大小。

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的特定行，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的行的子集，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定计算新高度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受到保护，并旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`参数是`false`，将使用你将在调用的假定条件下计算行高<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first row to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的第一行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的行数。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于当前的列宽计算新高度，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果在列宽也进行调整的假定条件下计算高度，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of the specified rows using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the heights with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整指定行的高度，还可以选择在列宽随后进行调整的假定条件下计算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制时调整行大小，但你想要调整大小仅行，例如那些已更新的绑定记录的范围之内的特定子集。

trans-unit.source: The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法调用; 一次调整指定行行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的特定行，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use a different overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整大小的所有行，请使用不同重载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定计算新高度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`参数是`false`，将使用你将在调用的假定条件下计算行高<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndexStart" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndexStart" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowsCount" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowsCount" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 当列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何确定列宽。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许您配置控件，以便以填充整个控件，或以适应单元格内容自动调整列宽。

trans-unit.source: Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: 当发生更改时控件的宽度，则将发生大小调整填充模式中。

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>一旦启用，每当更改行高。

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改为单个列的大小调整模式，设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet>, indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value from the control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet>，，该值指示列继承其行为并将其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>从控件的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 列填充模式中的将由所指示的比例的可用控件宽度划分其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 通过减去从控件的客户端区域的宽度的所有其他列的宽度确定可用于填充模式的宽度。

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此宽度小于组合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>所有填充模式列的值，显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列在都显示时带有最小宽度，并且用户列调整大小时被禁用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 只有具有列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>属性值`true`自动调整大小和更改的列可见性不会导致调整大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在列设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整鼠标列宽度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式调整列宽，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法或设置列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在主/从方案中使用此属性，其中两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将显示在父/子关系中两个表中的数据。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None>, and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，主机控件的列大小调整模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None>，并以编程方式初始化列宽度以适应加载的值。

trans-unit.source: The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table).
trans-unit.target: 详细信息控件设置为自动的列大小调整模式，以便在值更改 （例如，当用户更改父表中的当前行） 时，列将会自动调整。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 创建主/从窗体使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />, column headers are hidden, and at least one visible column has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />，列标题被隐藏，并且至少有一个可见列具有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" /> and at least one visible column with an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" /> is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />，并且至少一个具有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 属性值的可见列被冻结。

trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how row heights are determined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何确定行高。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value indicating the sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值，指示大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，允许您配置控件，使行高度自动调整以适应其内容的内容更改时。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>是启用，行高也会进行调整列宽更改时。

trans-unit.source: Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Only rows with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>属性值`true`自动调整大小和更改行的可见性不会导致调整大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在行设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整行高使用鼠标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>自动调整大小的行的值重新计算期间布局以使用的字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: To get the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>, you should retrieve the value in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取正确<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>，应检索窗体的中值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>而不是在窗体的构造函数中的事件。

trans-unit.source: To adjust row heights programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods, or set the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式调整行高，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法，或者设置行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the row to automatically resize based on the contents of the row headers and all of the columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将行设置为自动调整大小基于行标题和的所有列的内容。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自动调整大小的单元格时的内容更改 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" /> and row headers are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，且行标题被隐藏。

trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" />。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>属性确定的区域的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，不填充单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />，表示在控件背景中显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此控件无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImage" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 枚举中定义的背景图像布局。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> value indicating the background image layout.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值，指示背景图像的布局。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout.Tile" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout.Tile" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此控件无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Although this event occurs as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此事件都会发生如下所述，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>属性对于此控件无关。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select all the cell's contents; <see langword="false" /> to not select any contents.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该单元格的所有内容，为 <see langword="true" />；如果不选择任何内容，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Puts the current cell in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的单元格置于编辑模式下。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的单元格已经处于编辑模式或者成功进入编辑模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`该单元格无法进入编辑模式，可能会导致大量的原因。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`如果当前单元格是只读的。

trans-unit.source: It also returns `false` if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它还返回`false`如果单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>属性是`null`（即单元格不能承载编辑控件） 和单元格类型未实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>接口。

trans-unit.source: If the cell supports editing, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit> event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格支持编辑，此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>事件，可以取消，并返回`false`如果事件处理程序取消编辑。

trans-unit.source: If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it.
trans-unit.target: 如果不取消编辑单元格可以承载的编辑控件，此方法会初始化该控件，并显示它。

trans-unit.source: If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化失败，此方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格成功进入编辑模式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> is not set to a valid cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> 未设置为有效的单元格。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This method was called in a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 已经在 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit" /> 事件的处理程序中调用了此方法。

trans-unit.source: The type indicated by the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property does not derive from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 由单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性指示的类型不从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 类型派生。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The type indicated by the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 由单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性指示的类型不实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: Initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 对编辑单元格值的初始化失败，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.FixedSingle" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.FixedSingle" />。

trans-unit.source: This property affects the outer border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性会影响外部边框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: To set the style of the cell borders, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的单元格边框样式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化简单数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels edit mode for the currently selected cell and discards any changes.
trans-unit.target: 取消当前选定单元格的编辑模式并丢弃所有更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cancel was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消操作成功，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and the cancels edits in a row.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" /> 并且取消行中的编辑时发生。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在虚拟模式下，更改会提交到数据缓存在单元格级别默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event can be used when implementing row-level transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>实现行级事务时，可以使用事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>中的虚拟模式的控件。

trans-unit.source: When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row.
trans-unit.target: 当控件处于编辑模式，`rowInEdit`变量保存所编辑的行的索引和`customerInEdit`变量包含对一个对应于该行的客户对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 当用户取消退出编辑模式时，此对象会被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户正在编辑的行是用于新纪录的行，但是，丢弃旧的客户对象的值，并将替换为一个新，以便用户可以开始再次进行的编辑。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[演练： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> property can be set to an active value, to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个用以指示是否可以将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> 属性设置为活动值的值，以启用 IME 支持。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is an editable cell selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在选定的可编辑单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode starts for the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 选定单元格的编辑模式启动时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to reflect that the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以反映该当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>正在编辑。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is set to reflect which cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>设置以反映正在编辑的单元格。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell border style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的单元格边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style of the cells contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" />，表示包含在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Single>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleHorizontal>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleVertical>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Single>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleHorizontal>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleVertical>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性必须为系统颜色。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the cell border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 无法将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom>值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义单元格边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom" />.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the border style of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格边框样式更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格的任何部分被单击时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格的任何部分，包括边框和填充时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key.
trans-unit.target: 它也会发生当用户按下并释放空间键时的按钮单元格或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且如果按 SPACE 键的同时单击单元格都出现两次针对这些单元格类型。

trans-unit.source: To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定在单击单元格内容时，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event does not receive information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不接收有关鼠标位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件处理程序需要有关鼠标位置的信息，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件相反。

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick> event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick>事件处理程序中使用映像中的列的井游戏实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`.
trans-unit.target: 除非该游戏已结束，或已单击单元格，事件处理程序会将单元格的值设置为两个一<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>变量所表示的对象`x`和`o`。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中所示的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格的内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the cell content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格内容时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 它还当用户按下并释放时按钮单元格空格键或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且如果按空格键时，在单击单元格内容将发生这些单元格类型的两次时发生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to detect button clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> or link clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件来检测为按钮单击事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>或单击链接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件相反。

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在需要单元格的快捷菜单时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击单元格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示当前状态或单元格的值来确定的快捷菜单，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击单元格。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性或处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置重写行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件替代同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件和行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以指定`null`为单元格的快捷菜单，以防止行的快捷菜单重写。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件处理程序以显示在用户右键单击单元格时使用的自定义的快捷菜单。
