trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定单元格的编辑模式停止时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to clear the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in case it was previously set by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以清除行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在以前由设置的情况下属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event handler can clear the error text when the new cell value meets the validation criteria, but when the user reverts to the old cell value by pressing ESC, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>当新单元格的值符合验证条件，但当用户按 ESC，恢复到旧的单元格值时，事件处理程序可以清除错误文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[演练： 验证 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current cell changes in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or when the control receives input focus.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件中的当前单元格更改或者该控件接收到输入焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不具有输入的焦点并且单击的单元格以前不是当前单元格，为一次单击两次可能发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>当前单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: In this example the selection background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例选择背景色设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter>事件，然后重置为<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的错误文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其值或状态的单元格的错误。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，在单元格中显示错误标志符号除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>属性设置为`false`或单元格处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>检索属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，然后使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>多个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建单元格的错误消息，而无需取消行的共享或导致要复制到所有共享的单元格的单元格错误。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 需要设置单元格内容的显示格式时发生。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将尝试将单元格的值转换为适用于显示的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它会将一个数字值转换为以在文本框单元中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指示要用于通过设置的格式设置约定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>等返回的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果标准的格式设置是不够的可以自定义格式设置通过处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以指示的确切显示值，以及单元格样式，如前景色和背景颜色，用于单元格显示。

trans-unit.source: This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着你可以处理任何类型的单元格格式，而不考虑是否单元格的值本身需要进行格式设置此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>每次每个单元格绘制，因此，应避免耗时处理处理此事件时，事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 也会发生此事件时该单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>检索或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与单元格的值初始化属性。

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供从单元格的值的显示值的自定义转换，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>转换后的值，以确保新值所指定单元格的类型属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示没有进一步设置值的格式设置必要，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序完成后，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>格式都是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>属性返回的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，使用该单元格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: 无论的值如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，返回的对象的显示属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性用于呈现该单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义格式设置使用的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免处理此事件时出现的性能损失，请通过事件处理程序，而不是直接访问该单元格的参数访问单元格。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义格式化、 用户指定的值转换为实际的单元值，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格失去输入焦点并且不再是当前单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>当前单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: In this example the selection background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例选择背景色设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter>事件，然后重置为<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 在用户用鼠标单击单元格中的任何位置时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击使用任何鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定被单击的按钮。

trans-unit.source: To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要检测单击单元格，如按钮或链接在单元格中，内容使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的处理程序接收的列索引和鼠标指针位置的行索引。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件相反。

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user double-clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击使用任何鼠标按钮，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定被单击的按钮。

trans-unit.target: 当用户在鼠标指针位于单元格边界内时按鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter>事件处理程序中使用映像中的列的井游戏实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the cell value to determine the cursor and ToolTip to display.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序使用单元格的值来确定的光标和要显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中所示的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针离开单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave>事件处理程序中使用映像中的列的井游戏实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler resets the cursor and ToolTip, which are set in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序将重置，这是在中设置的光标和工具提示，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中所示的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针移到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件上时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while over a cell.
trans-unit.target: 用户在单元格上方释放鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user releases any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放任何鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定被单击的按钮。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 需要绘制单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件以自定义控件中的单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: 你可以绘制整个单元格自行，或绘制的单元格的特定部分，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来绘制其他部分。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件时，你应通过的参数的事件处理程序中，访问该单元格，而不是直接访问该单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来自定义的特定列中的所有单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格值已修改的情况下，当单元格退出编辑模式时发生。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将尝试将转换为实际的基础的单元格值指定单元格的类型中的单元格中显示的一个用户指定值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这种转换使用返回的单元格的单元格样式的格式设置属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: 如果标准转换不满足你的需求，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件，以便提供自定义值转换为所需的类型。

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以进入编辑模式，使用指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>属性，并可以退出编辑模式，在单元格中，提交更改，通过将移到另一个单元格或通过按 ENTER。

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 按 esc 键将恢复任何更改的值，它也会提交之前, 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件才会发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件才会发生单元格的值实际上已被修改，即使的最终值是与原始值相同。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 它也会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件，可以自行转换该值，或者你可以自定义默认转换。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以将值转换使用单元格自行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>与你选择的类型转换器方法。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以让默认类型转换器分析值，但需要修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，使用该单元格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你自行转换该值时，替换初始的格式化值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性中指定单元格的类型的转换值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示，没有任何进一步分析是必要的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序完成后，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>分析使用的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>与默认类型转换器方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现分析值使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>中传递的单元格样式属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，此值被分析使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>中传递的属性和类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义显示的格式值的一个单元格值的转换，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: 单元格状态更改(例如单元格失去或获得焦点)时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为新值时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格样式的某个值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>事件发生时的一个属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象由以下属性更改之一：

trans-unit.source: If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一个属性设置为另一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>，但相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件发生，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: 有关行、 列和单元属性的名称*PropertyName* `Changed`事件开头"`Row`"，"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>)。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要单元格的工具提示文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>处理程序中指定的工具提示文本将显示事件，每当鼠标指针位于单元格和控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>属性值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要显示工具提示当前状态或单元格的值来确定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或在鼠标指针进入单元格。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 单元格完成验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件可用于验证后处理的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to clear out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>事件来清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> if the user enters data that is not valid into a cell.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>如果用户输入不是有效的单元格中的数据。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格失去输入焦点时发生，并启用内容验证功能。

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取消此事件取消对当前单元格的更改。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此事件已取消在数据绑定模式下，新值不是推送到基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，取消此事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>事件来执行验证之后处理。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件，以确保仅正整数来表示所输入的用户。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>参考主题。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件发生时的用户指定的值也会提交，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时。

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: 对于复选框单元格，但是，你将通常想要立即处理更改。

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要在单击单元格时，请提交更改，你必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格，复选框单元格调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当更改一个单元格值，控件中的行不会自动进行排序。

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要在用户修改某个单元格时，排序控件，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event to update the values in a balance column of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件以更新的平衡列中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下发生：当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，并且 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 只有在单元格中有值的情况下才格式化和显示单元格时。

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件中的虚拟模式而不会导致要成为非共享行的行填充具有自定义数据存储区中的数据的单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: 若要将用户指定值添加到自定义数据存储区中，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件以填充单元格的正整数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下发生：当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，并且单元格值已更改并需要存储在基础数据源中时。

trans-unit.target: 使用此事件中的虚拟模式来使用用户指定的数据更新的自定义数据存储区。

trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件，以从控件中显示的数据存储中检索值。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 取消对当前选定的单元格的选择。

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 通过取消选择所有的选定单元格来清除当前的选择。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法，每个列和行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example clears the selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例清除选择的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `clearSelectionButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`clearSelectionButton`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的行索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <see langword="false" /> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: 如果要选择已排除的单元格、行或列，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要保留它的初始状态，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择当前选定的所有单元格（所指示的单元格除外），可以选择确保所指示的单元格处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: A`rowIndexException`值为-1 表示列标题，和一个`columnIndexException`值为-1 表示的行是标题。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于不取消选择单元格、 行或列由异常索引的情况下清除当前所选内容。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值允许选择单个单元格，此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>属性的每个单元格`false`，不包括中的行和指定列的单元格。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值的允许完整行或列的选择此方法还集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>的每个行或列的属性`false`、 行或列以包含指定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 排除的单元格、 行或列可能或可能未处于选定状态时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法如果选择`selectExceptionElement`参数值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: 根据选择模式中，在整个行或列也可能被选择结果。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> 大于最高的列索引。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> is less than -1 when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect" />; otherwise, <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect" /> 时，<paramref name="columnIndexException" /> 小于 -1；否则 <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> 大于最高的行索引。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> is less than -1 when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" />; otherwise, <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> 时，<paramref name="rowIndexException" /> 小于 -1；否则 <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" /> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以将单元格的文本值复制到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />，以及是否包括行标题和列标题文本。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.EnableWithAutoHeaderText" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.EnableWithAutoHeaderText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将每个选定的单元格的文本表示复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此值是单元格的值转换为字符串，或对于图像单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: 值复制到剪贴板中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>格式。

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, Microsoft Excel, and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 这些格式可用于将内容粘贴到应用程序 （如记事本） Microsoft Excel 和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件复制中包括所有选定的单元格的最小矩形包含单元格。

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 行和列不包含任何选定的单元格不在所复制的数据中表示。

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 由空白占位符表示剩余行和列中的所有未选定单元格。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于复制模式和选择模式中，复制的行和列的标头值可复制，以及。

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 当用户复制内容，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此数据对象检索从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要以编程方式将数据对象添加到剪贴板时，你可以调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法通过调用检索各个单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写这两种方法在派生类中自定义的复制的单元格的布局，或以支持其他数据格式或其中任何一个。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关剪贴板操作和数据格式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何启用复制中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 将列添加到控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to 0 will remove all columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>属性设为 0，将删除所有列从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>重置为一个值小于当前值，列将不再从末尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>设置为值大于当前值的情况下，列将添加到末尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>属性创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>用于显示和编辑文本。

trans-unit.target: 当列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性或列将设置为新值时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>列属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: 用户双击两列之间的分隔符时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击列分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以处理此事件，若要以编程方式调整大小仅根据当前可见的行中的内容的列使用大量的行时避免对性能有影响的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>属性不会扩展用户可在其中双击的区域。

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的宽度，则当用户双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击列标题时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: When a column heading is clicked in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column.
trans-unit.target: 当在中单击列标题<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，默认行为是根据所单击的列，对网格行进行排序，或若要反转排序顺序，如果网格已按所单击的列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> when the default behavior has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来执行模拟单击的默认行为的编程排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>时的默认行为已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, so clicking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> selects the contents of the column.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>，因此，单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>选择列的内容。

trans-unit.source: For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例代码，以按预期工作，默认列标题，请单击行为需要更改数据加载到每次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>事件处理程序，提供更改默认的行为的代码。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于列标题的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性必须为系统颜色。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 无法将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom>值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>属性是`true`，使用当前主题绘制列标题。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>对于除以外的所有列标题，将忽略属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，到未应用主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named`dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。
