trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default initial size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认初始大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the initial size of the control, which is 240 pixels wide by 150 pixels high.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示控件的初始大小（宽度为 240 个像素，高度为 150 个像素）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入新记录行以便可以使用默认值填充该行时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可让你填充用于新纪录的行，当用户输入行。

trans-unit.source: Initial values for the row come from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> returned by each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始行值来自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>每个列返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source.
trans-unit.target: 在数据绑定模式下，所有单元格绑定的列都存储在外部数据源中的数据的值。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入新记录的行时中的数据源之前创建的新行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: When you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性在事件处理程序，可以直接到数据源中添加值。

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，此事件发生后,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>每个单元格在新行中发生的事件，以便你可以在自定义数据存储区中存储的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event, which are then displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件发生在新行中，每个单元格检索中存储的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件，然后显示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how this event can be handled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明了如何可以处理此事件。

trans-unit.source: In the example, cells for the given columns are populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，默认值填充单元格，给定的列。

trans-unit.source: For the `CustomerID` column, the value is retrieved from a separate method (not implemented) that generates a unique customer ID.
trans-unit.target: 有关`CustomerID`列中，值从单独的方法 （未实现），生成唯一的客户 id。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, replace the column names with the names of the column objects from an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and provide appropriate default values.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，将列名称，从实际的列对象的名称替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制并提供适当的默认值。

trans-unit.source: When specifying columns by name, you must use the name of the column object and not the column header text.
trans-unit.target: 当按名称指定列，必须使用的列对象并不列标题文本的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include partial columns in the displayed column count; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包括显示列数中的部分列，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 返回向用户显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include partial rows in the displayed row count; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包括显示行数中的部分行，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 返回向用户显示的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示的行数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示控件的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，它表示控件的显示区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle%2A> property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control, not including the area occupied by any scroll bars that are showing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle%2A>属性返回的控件，不包括任何显示的滚动条占用的区域的显示区域的客户端矩形。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" />属性在派生类中，使用基类的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" />属性来扩展的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你必须提供所有实现。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 和它的子控件占用的非托管资源，另外还可以释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前单元格承载的控件（如果包含编辑控件的单元格处于编辑模式下）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> hosted by the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 当前单元格承载的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格不处于编辑模式，或单元格类型不适用于编辑控件，此属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this property in an overridden method of a custom cell type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明了如何在自定义单元格类型的重写方法中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: In the example, a reference to the editing control is retrieved, cast to a custom editing control type, and then populated with the current value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，对编辑的控件的引用是检索、 强制转换为自定义编辑的控件类型，然后填充单元格的当前值。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.
trans-unit.target: 显示用于编辑单元格的控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化在单元格进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: To perform other initialization, cast the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the specific control type and access the members directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行其他初始化，将值强制转换的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为特定于控件类型，并直接访问的成员。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>将事件处理程序附加到的编辑控件的事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制一次承载一个编辑控件和重复使用编辑控件，每当编辑之间不发生更改的单元格类型。

trans-unit.source: When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 将事件处理程序附加到编辑控件，因此必须采取预防措施以避免多次附加同一处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，请移除之前将该处理程序附加到事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 这将防止重复，如果处理程序已连接到的事件，但将不起任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的代码示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>当前单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event is associated with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`并确保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件是与事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets the panel that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" /> 的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Panel" /> that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Panel" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property, which is `null` when the current cell is not in edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> property is always available.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性，它是`null`不编辑模式，当前单元格时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>属性是始终可用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to visually differentiate a cell when it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件在处于编辑模式时以可视方式区分某个单元格。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A> of the cell's editing panel is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D>.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A>的单元格的编辑面板设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how to begin editing a cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何开始编辑单元格。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditOnKeystrokeOrF2" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditOnKeystrokeOrF2" />。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditProgrammatically> also allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>值除外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditProgrammatically>还允许用户通过双击单元格以开始编辑它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化简单数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值将导致控件进入编辑模式，但是对正在编辑的单元格值的初始化失败，并且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row and column headers use the visual styles of the user's current theme if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在对应用程序启用了可视样式的情况下，行标题和列标题是否使用用户当前主题的可视样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if visual styles are enabled for the headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对标题启用了可视样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用你的应用程序中启用视觉样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>设置为`true`，除之外的所有标头单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>使用当前主题绘制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to disable visual styles for the row and column headers in an application that has visual styles enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何禁用行和列中的标头的应用程序已启用视觉样式的视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: In this example, visual styles have been enabled for the application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> method in `Main`.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，视觉样式启用了应用程序通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>中的方法`Main`。

trans-unit.source: However, visual styles will not be applied to the row and column headers because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，视觉样式将不会应用于行和列标题因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>类。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 提交对当前单元格进行的编辑并结束编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the default error context.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认错误上下文提交对当前单元格进行的编辑并结束编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果编辑操作已提交并结束，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A> overload, passing in a bitwise combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Parsing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A>重载，并传入的按位组合中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Parsing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method may result in an exception if errors are not handled with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会导致异常，如果错误不会处理与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法提交单元格值，且没有 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件的处理程序或处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> 值的按位组合，指定可能出错的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the specified error context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误上下文提交对当前单元格进行的编辑并结束编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果编辑操作已提交并结束，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method may result in an exception if errors are not handled with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会导致异常，如果错误不会处理与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法提交单元格值，且没有 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件的处理程序或处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first cell currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; typically, this cell is in the upper left corner.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的第一个单元格；此单元格通常位于左上角。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示在控件中的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定哪个单元格位于第一行中，控件中当前显示的列。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是左上角，但对于从右到左的语言，它是右上角。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置此属性，以将控件滚动到指示的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确保排序后对当前单元格为可见。

trans-unit.source: This code works only with an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此代码仅适用于未绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格时，将不自动保留排序。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: In C#, you must also connect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted> event to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，你必须连接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted>到事件处理程序的事件。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时，指定的单元格不在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> property value of -1, indicating that it is a header cell or a shared cell.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 属性值为 -1，指示它为标题单元格或共享单元格。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> 属性值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the portion of the column that is currently scrolled out of view..
trans-unit.target: 获取该列中当前不在视图区域内的部分的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the portion of the column that is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: 该列中不在视图区域内的部分的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置某一列的索引，该列是显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上的第一列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 某一列的索引，该列是显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上的第一列。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible" /> 属性值为 <see langword="false" /> 的列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> 属性值为 <see langword="true" /> 的列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置某一行的索引，该行是显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 某一行的索引，该行是显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a row with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> 属性值为 <see langword="false" /> 的行。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen" /> 属性值为 <see langword="true" /> 的列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 显示的文本的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>属性是一个环境属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Drawing.Font>不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），您可以只分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>属性指定新<xref:System.Drawing.Font>对象。

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以基于新的字体基于现有的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>属性的默认值作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> value automatically updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>值会自动更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性，更改继承值的任何单元格的字体。

trans-unit.source: Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 标头单元格默认情况下，将重写值，并且你可以重写特定行、 列和单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 创建未绑定的 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的前景色。

trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的前景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor%2A> property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Int32" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" />，标识要检索的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values specifying the cells to count.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的按位组合，指定要计数的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of cells that satisfy the provided filter.
trans-unit.target: 获取满足所提供筛选器的单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of cells that match the <paramref name="includeFilter" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="includeFilter" /> 参数匹配的单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the number of cells in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定在某一特定状态的单元格的数目。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索选定的单元格的数目，例如，使用此方法与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: This is typically more efficient than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这是通常比使用效率更高<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this method to determine whether there are any cells selected in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以确定是否有任何中选定的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, if any cells are selected, their values are retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method and displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，如果未选择任何单元格，将检索其值通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法并显示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example illustrating the use of the Clipboard features of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例阐释如何使用的剪贴板功能的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> includes the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.ResizableSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> 包含 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.ResizableSet" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return the displayed portion of the cell only; <see langword="false" /> to return the entire cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果只返回该单元格的显示部分，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果返回整个单元格界限，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示单元格显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display rectangle of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 表示单元格显示矩形的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the entire cell bounds or the displayed portion only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回整个单元格界限或仅显示的部分。

trans-unit.source: To get the bounds of the cell contents only, use the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取该单元格的边界内容、 只可使用该单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小于 -1 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 -1 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted values that represent the contents of the selected cells for copying to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索表示选定单元格内容的格式化值，以便将其复制到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> that represents the contents of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" />，表示选定单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索表示选定单元格定义的区域的数据。

trans-unit.source: This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 此区域是最小的矩形包含所有选定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此区域中每个选定单元格的值通过调用检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region.
trans-unit.target: 对于未选定的单元格，在此区域将使用空白的占位符值。

trans-unit.source: This method combines these values into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> containing several formats for copying to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将合并到这些值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>包含几种格式复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 支持的剪贴板格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> 类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加所选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>到剪贴板的内容。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.Disable" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode" /> 设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.Disable" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide customized clipboard values.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以提供自定义的剪贴板值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, to support copying values from custom cell types.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，例如，若要支持从自定义单元格类型的复制值。

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return the column rectangle visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> bounds; <see langword="false" /> to return the entire column rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果要返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 界限内可见的列矩形，为 <see langword="true" />；如果要返回整个列矩形，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a column, as determined by the column index.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示某一列（由列索引确定）的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display rectangle of the column.
trans-unit.target: 表示列显示矩形的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不在 0 到列数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return the row rectangle visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> bounds; <see langword="false" /> to return the entire row rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果要返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 界限内可见的行矩形，为 <see langword="true" />；如果要返回整个行矩形，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a row, as determined by the row index.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示某一行（由行索引确定）的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display rectangle of the row.
trans-unit.target: 表示行显示矩形的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到行数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines separating the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置网格线的颜色，网格线对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的单元格进行分隔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> or <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" /> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 表示网格线颜色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.KnownColor.ControlDarkDark" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.KnownColor.ControlDarkDark" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property to any color when you use a single border; with other types of borders, the colors are specified by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性设置为任何颜色时使用一个边框; 与其他类型的边框，由操作系统指定的颜色。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property is ignored, and the current theme's colors are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性将被忽略，并使用当前主题的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Returns location information, such as row and column indices, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在给定了 x 坐标和 y 坐标的情况下返回位置信息，例如，行索引和列索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来确定的哪个部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件位于指定坐标处。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method—specifying the coordinates of a mouse click—to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以调用此方法-指定的坐标，鼠标单击-若要确定的单击的单元格或确定单击的标题单元格或滚动条的行和列索引。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates a cell in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的某个单元格无效，并强制对它进行重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要使之无效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified cell of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的指定单元格无效，并强制对它进行重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于强制单元格重新绘制的通常不会导致进行重新绘制的单元格的条件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以更改其外观由于外部事件的自定义单元格类型使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，当更改当前单元格，失效行强制要重新绘制自身的行。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到行数减 1 的有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前单元格是否有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前单元格有未提交的更改，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>未绑定到数据，该单元格编辑将被视为用户移到另一个单元格时提交。

trans-unit.source: If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果行标题是否可见，铅笔标志符号是可行的标头中的包含包含未提交的更改的单元格的行。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>是`true`和当前单元格承载的编辑控件，可以检索通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property to determine whether to commit a cell value and raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event from a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>属性以确定是否将提交一个单元格值，并引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件的处理程序从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列禁用按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the currently active cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否正在编辑当前处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell is being edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在编辑当前单元格，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that has focus is always in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>获得焦点上始终处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: If the current cell hosts an editing control and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A> is `true`, you can retrieve the editing control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前单元格承载的编辑控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>是`true`，您可以通过编辑控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>参考主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前行是否有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current row has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前行有未提交的更改，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`行中显示的铅笔标志符号时。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property will always equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property, unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>属性将始终等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>属性，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据源，编辑，支持虚拟模式已实现或使用行级提交范围。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will evaluate this property at the row level.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>将评估行级别的此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes.
trans-unit.target: 当用户导航离开行时，控件将提交所有行更改。

trans-unit.source: The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row.
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以按 CTRL + enter 键以提交无需离开行的行更改。

trans-unit.source: To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式提交行更改，请调用窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If your data source is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, you can also call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>，你还可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 可识别的输入字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character is recognized as an input character; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字符被识别为输入字符，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A character is recognized as an input character depending on whether the control is in edit mode and whether the current editing control can accept the character.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符被识别为具体取决于控件是否处于编辑模式和当前的编辑控件是否可以接受字符的输入字符。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the specified row and column.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引器以获取或设置位于指定行和指定列交叉点处的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the column and row with the specified indexes.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引器以获取或设置位于具有指定索引的列和行的交叉点处的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此索引器是访问通过的单元格的替代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this indexer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将此索引器。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the row with the specified index and the column with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 提供索引器以获取或设置位于具有指定索引的行和具有指定名称的列的交叉点处的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此索引器是访问通过的单元格的替代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this indexer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将此索引器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> at a time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户一次选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的多个单元格、行或列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户一次可以选择多个单元格、行或列，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为`true`，多个元素 （单元格、 行或列） 中可选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择多个元素，用户可以按住 CTRL 键同时单击选择的元素。

trans-unit.source: Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select.
trans-unit.target: 通过单击选择的第一个元素，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击要选择的最后一个元素，则可以选择连续的元素。

trans-unit.source: The selection scope is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选择作用域取决于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the user can select multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>，用户可以选择多个列。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and perform an operation on all the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性，以允许用户选择多个元素中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，执行对所有所选元素的操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择多个单元格，然后右键单击选定的单元格，以显示显示一组任务以执行上所选单元格的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, you can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定中选定的单元格、 行或列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，你可以访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of selected cells, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定选定的单元格数，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>方法的自变量值替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>方法来检索所选的行数和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A>方法来检索其中的列数。

trans-unit.source: These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法是比直接访问集合，使用大量的数据时效率更高。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelectChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelectChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelectChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelectChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 获取新记录所在行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row for new records, or -1 if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 新记录所在行的索引，如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> 为 <see langword="false" />，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: Unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `false`, the value of this property is equal to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`false`，此属性的值是否等于减 1 控件中的行数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" /> 时，将在用户定位到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 底部的新行时发生。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在虚拟模式下，此事件允许要在新行中，数据存储区中创建的新项，它还允许使用默认值填充的行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> event to track when a new row is being added, so logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event handler can initialize a new row's cell to an initial value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded>事件跟踪何时添加新行，因此逻辑中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件处理程序可以初始化新行的单元格的初始值。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>参考主题。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要指示该单元格有未提交的更改，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 当前单元格有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> when they have uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于允许自定义单元格类型，以通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>时它们具有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a custom cell scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义单元格方案中的此方法使用。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> implementation derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.OnValueChanged%2A> method and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NotifyCurrentCellDirty%2A> method to indicate a change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>实现派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.OnValueChanged%2A>方法，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NotifyCurrentCellDirty%2A>方法，以指示更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中所示[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRowsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRowsChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnAllowUserToAddRowsChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将提交一个单元格值或者进入编辑模式，但是数据源中的错误禁止执行此操作，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
