trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged" /> event and updates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor" /> property if the cursor was changed in user code.
trans-unit.target: 如果光标在用户代码中更改，将会引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged" /> 事件并更新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property value depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>属性值，具体取决于鼠标指针的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property stores the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property and ignores the control's changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>属性存储的正常值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>属性，并忽略控件的更改。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged> event occurs, and it updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property, if necessary, in addition to invoking any event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>发生事件时，并由此更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>属性，如有必要，除了调用任何事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Binding operations occur when the data changes while a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is in use.
trans-unit.target: 在数据更改时，将发生绑定操作而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>正在使用中。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will update its view and raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>发生事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>将更新其视图并引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>事件完成后。

trans-unit.source: When entering edit mode, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnEnter%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnEnter%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but upon entering focus, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 该控件被配置为在收到焦点时进入编辑模式，但是在进入焦点时，当前单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性不指示从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 派生并实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的类。

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 该控件被配置为在收到焦点时进入编辑模式，但是对编辑单元格值的初始化失败，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event, this method uses the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 除了引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件，此方法使用的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>属性更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将导致该控件进入编辑模式，但是对编辑单元格值的初始化失败，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnMouseLeave%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnMouseLeave%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize Cells and Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control by Extending Their Behavior and Appearance](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 自定义单元格和扩展他们行为和外观由 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The control changed from read-only to read/write, enabling the current cell to enter edit mode, but the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 该控件从只读更改为读/写，允许当前的单元格进入编辑模式，但是当前单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性不指示从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 派生并实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的类。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示绘制单元格的区域。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的背景。

trans-unit.source: The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: `clipBounds`参数表示的区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，需要重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户覆盖了整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>用另一个窗口，然后将其，暴露则`clipBounds`表示整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户覆盖的较小区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>然后再将它，然后暴露`clipBounds`表示所涉及的小块区域。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的按位组合，这些值表示要处理的一个或多个键。

trans-unit.source: Processes the A key.
trans-unit.target: 处理 A 键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理该键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses CTRL+A and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`当用户按 CTRL + A 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: By default, this selects all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此控件中选择所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所按键的信息。

trans-unit.source: Processes keys used for navigating in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 处理用于在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中导航的键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理该键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A> method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用密钥处理方法适合于按下的键 (例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>方法时按下 F2) 并返回该方法的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the behavior of the ENTER key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> subclass by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDataGridViewKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDialogKey%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改中的 ENTER 键的行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>通过重写子类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDataGridViewKey%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the ENTER key has the same behavior as the RIGHT ARROW key, making it easier for a user to edit multiple cells in a single row of data.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，输入密钥都有相同的行为向右箭头键，使其更便于用户编辑数据的单个行中的多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 所按的键将导致该控件进入编辑模式，但是当前单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性不指示从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 派生并实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的类。

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将提交一个单元格值或者进入编辑模式，但是数据源中的错误禁止执行此操作，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 删除键将删除一行或多行，但数据源中的错误将阻止删除，并且将没有针对 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件的处理程序，或处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在重写此方法，控件应返回<see langword="true" />以指示它已处理该键。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, return the result of the base version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 对于未由控件处理的键，返回此方法的基本版本的结果。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的按位组合，这些值表示要处理的一个或多个键。

trans-unit.source: Processes the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Delete 键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理该键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses DELETE to delete rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`当用户按 DELETE 键删除控件中的行。

trans-unit.source: The user can delete rows if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以删除行，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the data source must also be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>绑定到数据，<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的数据源的属性也必须设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 删除键将删除一行或多行，但数据源中的错误将阻止删除，并且将没有针对 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件的处理程序，或处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的按位组合，这些值表示要处理的一个或多个键。

trans-unit.source: Processes keys, such as the TAB, ESCAPE, ENTER, and ARROW keys, used to control dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 处理用来控制对话框的键，例如 Tab、Esc、Enter 和箭头键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理该键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called in edit mode to handle keyboard input that is not handled by the hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑模式下处理未由所承载的编辑控件的键盘输入调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If a key press is determined to not be an input key, it will be sent to the base class for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果按键确定不会是输入的键，它将发送到处理的基类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to change the behavior of the ENTER key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> subclass by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDataGridViewKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDialogKey%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何更改中的 ENTER 键的行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>通过重写子类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDataGridViewKey%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the ENTER key has the same behavior as the RIGHT ARROW key, making it easier for a user to edit multiple cells in a single row of data.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，输入密钥都有相同的行为向右箭头键，使其更便于用户编辑数据的单个行中的多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的按位组合，这些值表示要处理的一个或多个键。

trans-unit.source: Processes the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Tab 键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理该键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The TAB key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the new current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Tab 键将导致该控件进入编辑模式，但是新的当前单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性不指示从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 派生并实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的类。

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将提交一个单元格值或者进入编辑模式，但是数据源中的错误禁止执行此操作，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for using all windows and user events.
trans-unit.target: 使用所有窗口和用户事件。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.target: 权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以编辑 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user cannot edit the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不能编辑 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的单元格，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A cell is read-only if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly%2A> property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 单元格是只读的如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly%2A>属性是`true`单元格、 单元格的行和单元格的列或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control intended primarily for display.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>主要用于显示的控件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="true" />, the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值为 <see langword="true" />，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且当前单元格包含无法提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值将导致控件进入编辑模式，但是对正在编辑的单元格值的初始化失败，并且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.
trans-unit.target: 当前单元格在处于编辑模式时，用基础单元格的值刷新当前单元格的值会丢弃以前的任何值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if successful; <see langword="false" /> if a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果发生了 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以强制单元格更新其显示值处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.
trans-unit.target: 当外部进程修改单元格的值，而且你想要通知的更改，用户，因此会丢失用户指定的更改的情况下，即使，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text" /> property to its default value (<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />).
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text" /> 属性重置为其默认值 (<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />)。

trans-unit.source: Although this method behaves as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此方法的行为如下所述，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>属性对于此控件无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在需要行的快捷菜单时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要显示由行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击某一行除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>重写被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>为多行值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event to provide a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> based on the title of the employee.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件，以便提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>基于员工的标题。

trans-unit.source: In this example, there are two shortcut menus, one for managers and one for all other employees.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，有两个快捷菜单，一个用于管理人员，一个用于所有其他员工。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中显示的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中显示的行数。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>设置将为一个值小于当前值，从末尾中删除行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>设置为值大于当前值的情况下，行将添加到末尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The additional rows are based on the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他行基于中指定的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to 0, all rows will be removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>属性设为 0，将从删除所有行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 这是等效于调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`, you cannot set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`true`，无法设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>为 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to remove all rows except the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来删除除用于新纪录的行之外的所有行。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A> has the same result as setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> to 1 in this case, but is much faster.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>具有与设置相同的结果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>为在此情况下的 1，但较快得多。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>属性可与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>属性创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>用于显示和编辑文本。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to a value greater than 0 for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control without columns, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>属性的值大于 0 的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>无列，控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>自动添加。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, this property is used to track the number of entries in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，此属性用于跟踪中的条目数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than 1 and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小于 1，并且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> 设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时，同时设置了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle" /> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 当行的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性行设置为新值，或当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>行的属性设置为一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下发生：当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，并且 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 需要确定当前行是否有未提交的更改时。

trans-unit.source: By default, this event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此事件将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`true`如果当前行中的任何单元格进行了修改。

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>事件发生时用户将恢复到的行的编辑。

trans-unit.source: Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过按 esc 键两次时单元格处于编辑模式或第一次外部编辑模式恢复对行进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以用于通过设置自定义提交作用域中的虚拟模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>为正确的值，具体取决于选定的提交范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle this event to provide cell-level commit scope, meaning that the user can revert changes to the current cell only.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理此事件来提供单元格级提交作用域，这意味着用户可以还原到当前单元格的更改。

trans-unit.source: In cell-level commit scope, the row is treated as having uncommitted changes only when the current cell has uncommitted changes, rather than when any cell in the row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格级提交范围中，行被视为具有未提交更改时，才当前单元格有未提交的更改，而不是当行中的任意单元格有未提交的更改。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[演练： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.
trans-unit.target: 用户双击两行间的分隔符时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击行分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>属性不会扩展用户可在其中双击的区域。

trans-unit.source: If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的高度，则当用户双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.
trans-unit.target: 在某一行接收到输入焦点但变成当前行之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row.
trans-unit.target: 此事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>最初加载时，以及当用户选择当前行以外的行。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 此事件之前发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>更新属性。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property within the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索新输入行的索引，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在事件处理程序内的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the cells in the current row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>的当前行中单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，在中设置的背景色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter>事件，然后重置为<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在需要某一行的错误文本时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件设置或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其状态以及它包含的值的行的错误。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，行标题中显示错误标志符号除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>检索属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>为多行值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置行标题单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>属性必须为系统颜色。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 无法将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom>值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义边框样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the row headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>属性是`true`，行标题是否使用当前主题绘制。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is ignored for all row headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性将被忽略的所有行标题除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，到未应用主题。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that represents the default style applied to the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，表示应用于行标题单元格的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回此属性具有以下的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: DataGridViewCellStyle property
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCellStyle 属性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 默认值

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这些值将自动覆盖通过设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To force row headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制行标题继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>值，你必须设置值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>对象为默认值为指明<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column that contains row headers is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示包含行标题的列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the column that contains row headers is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示包含行标题的列，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is `false`, a row whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking the mouse cursor anywhere along the bottom border of the row to be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>属性是`false`，行其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>属性设置为`true`仍可调整大小在用户界面 (UI) 中通过单击鼠标光标下边框要调整大小的行上的任意位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="false" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值为 <see langword="false" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column that contains the row headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含行标题的列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the column that contains row headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含行标题的列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 43.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 43。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>属性可以用于调整行标题列到指定的宽度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整以适应行标题单元格的内容此列的宽度，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property in a row-painting scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>在行绘制方案中的属性。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the value of this property is used to calculate the bounds within which a custom background is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，此属性的值用于计算在其中绘制自定义背景的边界。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example available in[How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum width of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum width of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时，指定的值小于 4 像素的最小宽度或大于 32768 像素的最大宽度。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以调整行标题的宽度，以及它是由用户调整还是根据标题的内容自动调整。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值，指示可以在什么模式下调整行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为自动调整大小模式时，则无法由用户调整行标题的宽度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式调整行标题的高度，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>方法或一组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置列标题的大小调整模式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 标头大小有关的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件不支持双缓冲。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>设置为`true`中派生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when information about row height is requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求有关行高度的信息时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于在排序操作之后保留自定义行高。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 这是必需的因为排序操作通常由数据源，不会不跟踪的数据行和控件中的行的对应关系。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况下，你可以提供你自己的数据存储和排序操作。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>事件，以存储更新后的高度的信息，当用户更改行高度。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>以当控件需要它时检索存储的高度信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 用户更改行高度时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性设置为`true`或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性设置为值`null`。

trans-unit.source: This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于跟踪和存储行高度信息，以便可以在排序操作之后还原它。

trans-unit.source: To restore height information, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要还原高度信息，请处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，仅当用户更改行的高度时，才会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 如果以编程方式更改行的高度，你必须存储在同一时间的新高度信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
