trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件中显示的滚动条的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars.Both" />。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值，无论它们在需要时才显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以防止出现滚动条。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，例如，如果你想要为滚动提供备用用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is unable to scroll due to a cell change that cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置此属性的值，因为无法提交或取消一个单元格更改而导致 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 无法滚动。

trans-unit.source: Selects all the cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>为列选择模式，此方法调用时，每个列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`true`，和每个行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 相反，当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是行选择模式，此方法调用时，每个行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`true`，而每一列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `selectAllButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`selectAllButton`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的单元格的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" /> that represents the cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />，表示用户选定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property is always populated regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>而不考虑始终填充属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您应不执行操作在集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection to find the sum of the values in the selection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合，以便在所选内容中查找值的总和。

trans-unit.source: In the example, this collection is iterated through and the valid values are added to the sum, which is displayed in a label.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，然后，循环访问此集合和有效的值添加到在标签中显示的总和。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" /> that represents the columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" />，表示用户选定的列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property to be populated with selected columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>属性使用填充所选列。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您应不执行操作在集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property to get the selected column in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>属性来获取所选的列中的编程排序。

trans-unit.source: In this example, this property is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method to determine the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，在使用此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>方法来确定排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的行的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" /> that contains the rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />，包含用户选定的行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> property to be populated with selected rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>属性使用填充选定的行。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。

trans-unit.source: You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您应因此不执行操作在集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically select a row, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式选择某一行，将设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, if the first row is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> collection, then the deletion is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，如果第一行包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>集合中，则删除操作已取消。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 当前所选内容更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action.
trans-unit.target: 选定的单元格或取消所选内容时，是否通过编程方式或用户执行任何操作时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此事件非常有用，当你想显示当前选定的单元格的总和时。

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 当你更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件之前发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event handler accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件处理程序访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>此时属性将获取其以前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将此事件。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the form displays the sum of values in the selected cells, and updates the sum when the selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，该窗体将选定的单元格中显示值的总和和所选内容更改时，更新之和。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的单元格。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect" />。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property clears the current selection.
trans-unit.target: 更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性清除当前的选择。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property of one or more columns is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />，而且有一列或多列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the width or height values exceeds the maximum value of 8,388,607.
trans-unit.target: 一个或两个宽度或高度值超过最大值 8,388,607。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the new current cell the anchor cell for a subsequent multicell selection using the SHIFT key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将新的当前单元格用作使用 Shift 键选择的后续多个单元格的定位单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to validate the value in the old current cell and cancel the change if validation fails; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要验证旧的当前单元格中的值并在验证失败时取消更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell is being set as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的单元格是通过单击鼠标设置的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前处于活动状态的单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell was successfully set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前单元格设置成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>发生更改的当前单元格时，控件使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current cell without changing the selection and optionally without validating the previous cell or changing the selection anchor cell.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可更改当前单元格而无需更改所选内容和 （可选） 而无需验证上一个单元格或更改所选内容定位单元格。

trans-unit.source: The anchor cell is the first cell of a block of multiple cells that the user can select by holding down the SHIFT key and clicking the last cell of the block.
trans-unit.target: 定位单元格是块的用户可以选择通过按住 SHIFT 键并单击块的最后一个单元的多个单元格的第一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: If `rowIndex` and `columnIndex` are both -1, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`rowIndex`和`columnIndex`是这两个-1，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1, and <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1，并且 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不是 -1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1, and <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1，并且 <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不是 -1。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> 属性值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This method was called for a reason other than the underlying data source being reset, and another thread is currently executing this method.
trans-unit.target: 已调用此方法，但其原因不是因为正在重置基础数据源，且另一个线程当前正在执行此方法。

trans-unit.source: The new current cell tried to enter edit mode, but its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的当前单元格尝试进入编辑模式，但是它的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 属性不指示从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 派生并实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的类。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the cell; <see langword="false" /> to cancel the selection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果取消选择该单元格，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the cell with the specified row and column indexes.
trans-unit.target: 更改具有指定的行索引和列索引的单元格的选择状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>单元格的选择状态发生更改时，控件使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 选择状态的更改而不考虑当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值，并且无需更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要实现自己的选择模式，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column.
trans-unit.target: 该列的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the column; <see langword="false" /> to cancel the selection of the column.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该列，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果取消选择该列，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the column with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 更改具有指定索引的列的选择状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>列的选择状态发生更改时，控件使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 选择状态的更改而不考虑当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值，并且无需更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要实现自己的选择模式，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 行的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the row; <see langword="false" /> to cancel the selection of the row.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择该行，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果取消选择该行，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the row with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 更改具有指定索引的行的选择状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>行的选择状态发生更改时，控件使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 选择状态的更改而不考虑当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>属性值，并且无需更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要实现自己的选择模式，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show cell errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示单元格错误。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a red glyph will appear in a cell that fails validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在未通过验证的单元格中显示红色标志符号，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针停留在单元格上时，是否显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用单元格工具提示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met:
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值时`true`和鼠标指针位于单元格，该单元格显示工具提示，当满足以下条件之一：

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not `null` or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, and a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>属性不是`null`或值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`，和的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的值以外的其他<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property of the cell has a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>单元格的属性具有值以外<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置不起作用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件处理程序因为自动获取属性的值引发事件并返回的工具提示文本指定在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The cell value is truncated in the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的值被截断在单元格显示中。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>属性值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>，截断的单元格的值的完整值显示工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示编辑标志符号是否在所编辑的单元格的行标题中可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果编辑标志符号可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 行标题将显示类似于铅笔，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且用户已向单元格进行的更改时编辑标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph is colored by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 编辑标志符号会变色使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>行标题单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有足够的空间来完全显示，则不会呈现标志符号。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row header cell has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果行标题单元格具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>移除属性集，标志符号，如果没有为文本和字形足够的空间。

trans-unit.source: The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 显示编辑标志符号的值由控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>中的虚拟模式属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它由控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The standard glyph is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: 公开不公开的标准标志符号。

trans-unit.source: To customize the glyph, you can create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 要自定义标志符号，可以创建自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行标题是否为包含数据输入错误的每一行显示错误标志符号。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> indicates there is an error; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 指示有错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>属性指示是否在行中单元格之一时出错。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>, then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>设置一个值为非<xref:System.String.Empty>，然后为错误标志符号 (![ErrorProvider 图标](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 图标")) 的行标题中所示。

trans-unit.source: The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 行标题的默认宽度包括足够空间来显示错误标志符号，显示标志符号。

trans-unit.source: If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果行标题的大小调整，以便没有足够的空间来完全显示标志符号，则不会呈现标志符号。

trans-unit.source: Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 因为文本和标志符号，可以显示行标题，标头将显示内容按优先级别，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Text displayed in the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 显示在行标题单元格的文本。

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph.
trans-unit.target: 编辑标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The error glyph.
trans-unit.target: 错误标志符号。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在行的宽度会降低，错误标志符号会消失第一次，然后标准标志符号，则文本。

trans-unit.source: Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 高级的用户可以通过开发一个自定义自定义错误标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>类。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的内容进行排序。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> that performs the custom sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行自定义排序操作的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control using an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 接口的实现来对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的内容进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许的排序功能的高级自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>类。

trans-unit.source: In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 为了实现高度自定义排序操作，你可以编写的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>事件和调用此方法与实现的类的实例<xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>作为参数的接口。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，通常将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>禁用自动排序并留出空间的排序标志符号。

trans-unit.source: When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在排序时将设置为编程排序模式的列，您必须显示排序标志符号自己通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法时才起作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>未设置属性。

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件到外部数据源，您必须使用提供该数据源的排序操作。

trans-unit.source: When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself.
trans-unit.target: 在您自己的数据源提供通过实现虚拟模式时，你还必须处理的排序操作自己。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法会自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>属性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method overload in a multiple column sort scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>在多个列排序方案中的方法重载。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface is implemented in the `RowComparer` class.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>中实现接口`RowComparer`类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The column by which to sort the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的内容进行排序时所依据的列。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定列的内容，按升序或降序对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件的内容进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method sorts the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> by comparing values in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的内容进行排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>通过比较指定列中的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the sort operation will use the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A> method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，排序操作将使用<xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>方法来比较的在列中使用的单元格对<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>属性自动设置，则显示相应的排序标志符号。

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义排序操作使用此方法通过处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 此事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>未设置属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>已设置属性，此方法适用于仅限数据绑定列。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound columns have had their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定列中获得了其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性集。

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件包含绑定和未绑定列，则必须实现虚拟模式时对控件进行排序的绑定的列保持未绑定列的值。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以执行此操作通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性`true`和处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the column is editable, you should also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果列是可编辑，则还应处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持数据绑定控件时，按未绑定列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>中的编程排序。

trans-unit.source: The specified column is not part of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的列不属于此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property has been set and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> property of the specified column returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 属性已设置，而指定列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> 属性返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> property of the specified column returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />，而指定列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> 属性返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The object specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property does not implement the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 属性指定的对象未实现 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The object specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property has a <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 属性指定的对象的 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting" /> 属性值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 对两个单元格的值进行比较以执行排序操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>未设置属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 此事件将对正在排序的列中的单元格进行比较。

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 仅当用户单击与列的标头时，才发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>，或当调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 当发生此事件时对具有的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件在一个列或多个列中使用的单元值的行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>属性中指定的列中的单元格值进行比较<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>属性，以访问通过其他列中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> in a multiple column sort.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>中多个列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control completes a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件完成排序操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性设置为`true`和控件按的未绑定列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确保排序后对当前单元格为可见。

trans-unit.source: This code works only with an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此代码仅适用于未绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格时，将不自动保留排序。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: In C#, you must also connect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted> event to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，你必须连接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted>到事件处理程序的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column by which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 内容的当前排序所依据的列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> by which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 内容的当前排序所依据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not sorted, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>未排序，则此属性将返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: When the column indicated by this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性指示的列具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>，它将显示基于值的排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 当列具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义排序的控件进行排序时，此属性的值没有意义。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义排序的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>中的编程排序属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是按升序或降序对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件中的项进行排序，还是不排序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于确定指定的列时，将显示的排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>属性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>。

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>, you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当列具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>，您必须显示，并且通过自己隐藏排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>, you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: 当列具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>，可以显示排序标志符号，但如果自动调整列的大小不为其保留空间。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义排序的控件进行排序时，此属性的值没有意义。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义排序的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>中的编程排序属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示按 Tab 键是否会将焦点按 Tab 键顺序移到下一个控件，而不是将焦点移到控件中的下一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按 Tab 键会将焦点按 Tab 键顺序移到下一个控件，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`允许使用 TAB 键将焦点的单元格的网格中移动。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍单元格焦点按给定的 TAB 键组合时的更改。

trans-unit.source: Key combination
trans-unit.target: 组合键

trans-unit.source: Result
trans-unit.target: 结果

trans-unit.source: TAB
trans-unit.target: Tab

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.StandardTab%2A> property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.StandardTab%2A>属性是`false`，在焦点移动到下一个单元格的行中。

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row.
trans-unit.target: 如果将焦点放在行中的最后一个单元，在焦点移动到下一行中的第一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的最后一个单元的焦点位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，在焦点移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: SHIFT+TAB
trans-unit.target: Shift+Tab

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.StandardTab%2A> is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.StandardTab%2A>是`false`，在焦点移动到上一个单元格的行中。

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦点位于行中的第一个单元格，焦点移到的最后一个前一行中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的第一个单元的焦点位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，在焦点移动到上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: CTRL+TAB
trans-unit.target: Ctrl+Tab

trans-unit.source: The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 焦点移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: 在控件样式更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此控件无关。

trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>实例。

trans-unit.target: 已对此控件调用了此方法。
